content: पुरस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Before(in time or space), in front, in the presence of, before the eyes of (by itself or with <ab>gen.</ab>); अमुं पुरः पश्यसि देवदारुं <ls>R. 2. 36</ls>; तव प्रसादस्य पुरस्तु संपदः <ls>Ś. 7. 30</ls>; तस्य स्थित्वा कथमपि पुरः <ls>Me. 3</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 3</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 43</ls>; often used with कृ, गम्, धा, भू (see below). {@--2@} In the east, from the east. {@--3@} Eastward.
